modules.description: This module creates and manages GTK windows for displaying RGB images, supporting user interaction through mouse and keyboard events. It allows dynamic resizing, updating window content with new images, and registering callbacks for input or timing events. Concrete use cases include visualizing image processing results in real-time or building interactive image-based interfaces.

Draws custom graphics onto grayscale or RGB image buffers using Cairo. Provides a `draw` function that takes a Cairo drawing operation and modifies an 8-bit image in place. Useful for overlaying shapes, text, or visualizations directly onto pixel data.

This module displays RGB images in interactive GTK windows and supports real-time updates and input handling. It provides tools to draw directly onto grayscale or RGB image buffers using Cairo. Concrete use cases include visualizing image processing pipelines and building interactive image analysis tools.
